questions.pinyinExample: nǐ hǎo ， nǐ jiào shén me míng zì
questions.exampleTranslated: Hello, what is your name?

questions.explanation: May I please ask, used at the start of the sentence
questions.Example: 请问厕所在哪?

questions.exampleTranslated: Excuse me, where is the toilet?

questions.PinyinExample: xiè xiè nǐ bāng wǒ
questions.exampleTranslated: Thanks for helping me

questions.question: _____, _____今天早餐吃什么？
questions.explanation: As the question is asking a question, we need to use 请问。早餐 means breakfast, therefore it would be logical for it to be in the morning, and the morning greeting would be 早安

questions.question: 我要睡觉了，_________
questions.explanation: Question translates to I want to sleep already, hence the most fitting greeting would be 晚安

questions.question: ______ 你买午饭给我
questions.explanation: Question translates to thanking the person for buying lunch, hence the appropriate greeting would be thank you

questions.word: 一二三一二三四五六七八九十四
questions.pinyin: yī èr sān sì wǔ liù qī bā jiǔ shí
questions.Example: 我有三个苹果
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ yǒu sān gè píng guǒ
questions.exampleTranslated: I have three apples

questions.pinyin: shí yī, shí èr, shí sān, èr shí
questions.Example: 我请了十五位朋友来我生日会
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ qǐng liǎo shí wǔ wèi péng yǒu lái wǒ shēng rì huì
questions.exampleTranslated: I have invited 15 friends to my birthday party

questions.word: 一百，两百十二，五百二十三，九百九十九
questions.pinyin: yī bǎi ， liǎng bǎi shí èr ， wǔ bǎi èr shí sān ， jiǔ bǎi jiǔ shí jiǔ

questions.PinyinExample: wǒ gāng gāng jiǎn dào de qián bāo lǐ yǒu liǎng bǎi èr shí wǔ kuài qián
questions.exampleTranslated: The wallet that I just picked up has 225 dollars inside.

questions.word: 一千，五千六百七十八， 一万两千三百四十五，六十七万八千九百零一
questions.pinyin: yī qiān ， wǔ qiān liù bǎi qī shí bā ， yī wàn liǎng qiān sān bǎi sì shí wǔ ， liù shí qī wàn bā qiān jiǔ bǎi líng yī

questions.PinyinExample: nín cóng zhōng zhuàn qǔ de lì xī wéi èr shí sān wàn sì qiān wǔ bǎi liù shí qī yuán

questions.Example: 本周末的彩票奖金是两百五十万
questions.PinyinExample: běn zhōu mò de cǎi piào jiǎng jīn shì liǎng bǎi wǔ shí wàn
questions.exampleTranslated: This weekend's lottery prize is $2.5 million

Translate 10,485 to chinese
Translate 6 million 50 thousand and 6 hundred to chinese

questions.PinyinExample: wǒ men jiā rén jì huà míng nián zuò fēi jī qù xīn jiā pō dù jià

questions.Example: 那艘渡轮将乘客从新加坡港口送往印尼的巴淡岛。
questions.PinyinExample: nà suǒ dù lún jiāng chéng kè cóng xīn jiāpō gǎng kǒu sòng wǎng Yìn ní de bā dàn dǎo

questions.question: 新加坡河上有很多______，可以欣赏城市的美丽夜景
questions.explanation: 河 represent river, hence the only transport that could travel on water would be a boat/ferry,船

questions.question: 我需要乘坐 302 号________回家
questions.explanation: Question has prompted with a number, high chance would be bus

questions.question: 我下周乘________去香港
questions.explanation: Question has mentioned the author would be going to Hong Kong, therefore the highest probability would be a flight

questions.question: What does “我后退一步，然后向左转” mean?
options: I stepped back, then turned right
I stepped forwards, then turned left
I stepped back, then turned left
I stepped forwards, then turned right
questions.correct_answer: I stepped back, then turned left
questions.explanation: 后退 means stepped back, 左转 means turn left
